conversations.body_text: Hi Andrei R.,    We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with replenishment expected by the 27th. At that time, we shall dispatch your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping charges incurred.

Hi,

Have you got any update for me? Thanks.

Kind regards,

Andrei
Hi Andrei R.,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326634370DE

Hei,

No worries, I already got that before. But thank you anyway :)


Kind regards,

Andrei



On Fri, 5. Dec 2025 at 13:26, service@simsonn.com
